mod.name: Beaked The Cultist
mod.description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.6.7
- Fixed Sacred Deck crash with Animator mod (thanks to Aphid for the detailed report!)
- Fixed a crash when picking up Vigor Burst.

0.6.6
- Bugfixes for StS 1.1.
- Possibly fixed Sacred Deck crashes?

0.6.5
- Fixed Giant Parasite crash.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!

cards.name: Ceremony
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Ritual.

cards.name: Ceremony+
cards.description: Gain 1 Ritual.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Book's Flurry
cards.description: Deal 2 (non-attack) damage for every card played this combat.

cards.name: Book's Flurry+
cards.description: Deal 3 (non-attack) damage for every card played this combat.

cards.name: Head's Impatience
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Strength until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Head's Impatience+
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 2 Strength until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Inspiration
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, Exhaust this and draw 2 more cards.

cards.name: Lagavulin's Ferocity
cards.description: The first Attack you play each turn deals double damage.

cards.name: Lagavulin's Ferocity+
cards.description: The first Attack you play each turn deals triple damage.

cards.name: Leader's Execution
cards.description: Deal 6 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Leader's Execution+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Nemesis' Slickness
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Nemesis' Slickness+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Nob's Rage
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Nob's Rage+
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked, gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: Psalm
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Psalm+
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Reptomancer's Bite
cards.description:
Apply 99 Weak.
Apply 99 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Reptomancer's Bite+
cards.description:
Remove target's Artifact.
Apply 99 Weak.
Apply 99 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Respite
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Sentry's Pulse
cards.description: Remove ALL Buffs from an enemy.

cards.name: Sentry's Pulse+
cards.description: Remove ALL Buffs from ALL enemies.

cards.name: Stick
cards.description: ALL Stick-Smack cards deal 1 additional damage this combat. Return the last played Stick-Smack card to your hand.

cards.name: Stick+
cards.description: ALL Stick-Smack cards deal 2 additional damage this combat. Return the last played Stick-Smack card to your hand.

cards.name: Taskmaster's Torture
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Apply 5 Bleed.

cards.name: Taskmaster's Torture+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Apply 8 Bleed.

cards.name: Walker's Fury
cards.description: Gain 3 Ritual.

cards.name: Walker's Fury+
cards.description: Gain 5 Ritual.

cards.name: Brace
cards.description:
Retain. Gain 0 Block.
Block increases by 1 for each card you play while this is in your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Brace for Impact
cards.description: Gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Brace for Impact+
cards.description: Gain 2 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Brace+
cards.description:
Retain. Gain 0 Block.
Block increases by 2 for each card you play while this is in your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Cower
cards.description:
Gain 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cower+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cursing Blood
cards.description: Enemy loses !beaked:wI! Strength. Wither 1.

cards.name: Cursing Blood+
cards.description: Enemy loses !beaked:wI! Strength. Wither 1.

cards.name: Daydream
cards.description: Shuffle 3 Inspiration into your draw pile.

cards.name: Daydream+
cards.description: Shuffle 4 Inspiration into your draw pile.

cards.name: Dig Deep
cards.description:
Heal 3 HP for each Ritual you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dig Deep+
cards.description:
Heal 5 HP for each Ritual you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Evade
cards.description: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Evade+
cards.description: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Feel My Pain
cards.description:
Lose 50% of your current HP.
Gain 6 Strength.

cards.name: Feel My Pain+
cards.description:
Lose 50% of your current HP.
Gain 9 Strength.

cards.name: Flinch
cards.description:
Gain !beaked:wB! Block.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Flinch+
cards.description:
Gain !beaked:wB! Block.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Foresight+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Next turn, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Insight
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.

cards.name: Insight+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.

cards.name: Poke
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
If it's an Attack, deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Poke+
cards.description:
Draw 2 card.
If it's an Attack, deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Redirect
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to !beaked:wI! times your Strength, then lose all Strength.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Redirect+
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to !beaked:wI! times your Strength, then lose all Strength.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Resilience
cards.description:
Lose 3 Strength.
Lose 4 HP.
Gain 2 Artifact.

cards.name: Resilience+
cards.description:
Lose 3 Strength.
Lose 4 HP.
Gain 2 Artifact.

cards.name: Survival Instinct
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Can only be played if you haven't played any other cards this turn.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Become Entangled.

cards.name: Survival Instinct+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Can only be played if you haven't played any other cards this turn.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Become Entangled.

cards.name: Tradeoff
cards.description:
Exhaust !beaked:wI! random card in your hand.
Wither -1.
Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Tradeoff+
cards.description:
Exhaust !beaked:wI! random card in your hand.
Wither -1.
Draw 6 cards.

cards.name: Tucking Feathers
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Gain Block equal to their total cost.

cards.name: Tucking Feathers+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Gain Block equal to their total cost.

cards.name: Tweet
cards.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Tweet+
cards.description: Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Warrior Essence
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy X times. Heal for 25% of unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Warrior Essence+
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy X+1 times. Heal for 25% of unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Windmill
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Whenever you play a Skill this turn, deal 6 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Windmill+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Whenever you play a Skill this turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Barbed Wire
cards.description:
Gain Thorns equal to your Strength.

cards.name: Barbed Wire+
cards.description:
Gain Thorns equal to your Strength.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Blood For The Gods
cards.description:
Take 10 damage.
Next turn, heal twice that much HP.

cards.name: Blood For The Gods+

Take 15 damage.
Next turn, heal twice that much HP.

cards.name: Blood Ritual

cards.name: Blood Ritual+

Gain 2 Ritual.

cards.name: Bounce Back

Remove all of your Debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bounce Back+
cards.description:
Remove all of your Debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crazy Rituals
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a random card of a random color on a random target.

cards.name: Crazy Rituals+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a random card of a random color on a random target.

cards.name: Desperate Swing
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals 1 more damage for every 5 points of HP missing.

cards.name: Desperate Swing+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals 1 more damage for every 4 points of HP missing.

cards.name: Devastation
cards.description: When you draw a Depleted card, draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Devastation+
cards.description: When you draw a Depleted card, draw 2 more cards.

cards.name: Dig Deeper
cards.description:
Heal 1 HP for each Strength you have.
Lose all Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dig Deeper+
cards.description:
Heal 1 HP for each Strength you have.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Hexing
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to all enemies that don't intend to attack.

cards.name: Hexing+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to all enemies that don't intend to attack.

cards.name: Huntress Essence
cards.description:
Heal 1 HP and draw 1 card for each card in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Huntress Essence+
cards.description:
Heal 3 HP and draw 1 card for each card in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Huntress Spirit
cards.description:
Your next Skill this turn is played twice.
Gain Dexterity equal to its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Huntress Spirit+
cards.description:
Your next Skill this turn is played twice.
Gain Dexterity equal to twice its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Machine Spirit
cards.description:
Your next Power this turn is played twice.
Heal for 3 times its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Machine Spirit+
cards.description:
Your next Power this turn is played twice.
Heal for 5 times its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Maddening Murmurs
cards.description: At the start of your turn, place a random card from your discard pile into your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.

cards.name: Maddening Murmurs+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, place a random card from your discard pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Mantra
cards.description: Deal 4 damage for every Wither card in your deck.

cards.name: Mantra+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage for every Wither card in your deck.

cards.name: Mimic Huntress
cards.description: Add a random Silent card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Mimic Huntress+
cards.description: Add a random upgraded Silent card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Mimic Machine
cards.description: Add a random Defect card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Mimic Machine+

cards.name: Mimic Warrior
cards.description: Add a random Ironclad card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Mimic Warrior+
cards.description: Add a random upgraded Ironclad card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Molting
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Gain 7 Block, or !beaked:B+M! Block if it was a Depleted card.

cards.name: Molting+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Gain 10 Block, or !beaked:B+M! Block if it was a Depleted card.

cards.name: Negation
cards.description:
Ignore the next Wither effect this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Negation+
cards.description:
Ignore the next 2 Wither effects this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overexert
cards.description:
Double your Energy.
For each Energy gained, lose 3 HP.

cards.name: Overexert+
cards.description:
Double your Energy.
For each Energy gained, lose 2 HP.

cards.name: Overpower
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals 1 more damage for every 5 HP you currently have.

cards.name: Overpower+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals 1 more damage for every 4 HP you currently have.

cards.name: Pecker
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage !beaked:wI! times.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Pecker+
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage !beaked:wI! times.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Recite
cards.description: Add 2 Psalm cards to your hand.

cards.name: Recite+
cards.description: Add 3 Psalm cards to your hand.

cards.name: Replenish
cards.description: Replenish 1 use of a Wither card in your hand.

cards.name: Replenish+
cards.description: Replenish 1 use of a Wither card in your hand.

cards.name: Ritual Of Body
cards.description: Spend 1 Ritual. Gain 1 Plated Armor at the start of each turn.

cards.name: Ritual Of Body+
cards.description: Spend 1 Ritual. Gain 2 Plated Armor at the start of each turn.

cards.name: Roost
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Increase this card's cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

Increase this card's cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Ruin Sticks
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.

cards.name: Ruin Sticks+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Add a Regret to your hand.

cards.name: Sacrificial Attack
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies. Strength affects Sacrificial Attack 2 times.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Sacrificial Attack+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies. Strength affects Sacrificial Attack 3 times.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Sacrificial Dive
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, lose HP equal to half of its total attack damage. It loses 99 Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sacrificial Dive+
cards.description: If the enemy intends to attack, lose HP equal to half of its total attack damage. It loses 99 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Stick Smack
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Shuffle a Stick into your draw pile.

cards.name: Stick Smack+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Shuffle an Upgraded Stick into your draw pile.

cards.name: Struggle
cards.description: Deal 4 damage for each other card in your hand. End your turn.

cards.name: Struggle+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage for each other card in your hand. End your turn.

cards.name: Stunning Blow
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Wither 3.

cards.name: Stunning Blow+
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Vigor Burst
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, heal 3 HP.
When added to your deck, gain 5 Max HP. If removed or transformed from your deck, lose 5 Max HP.

cards.name: Vigor Burst+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, heal 5 HP.
When added to your deck, gain 5 Max HP.

cards.name: Warrior Spirit
cards.description:
Your next Attack this turn is played twice.
Gain Strength equal to its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Warrior Spirit+
cards.description:
Your next Attack this turn is played twice.
Gain Strength equal to twice its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wind Bringer
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Wind Bringer+
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Awakened Form
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [E] for each Boss killed.
Cards cost 1 less [E].

cards.name: Awakened Form+
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [E] for each Boss killed.
Cards cost 1 less [E].
Can reduce costs below 0.

cards.name: Brainwash
cards.description:
Exhaust all Depleted cards in your hand.
Retain your hand this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Brainwash+
cards.description:
Retain.
Exhaust all Depleted cards in your hand.
Retain your hand this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: CAW!
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies X times. Apply X Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Wither 1.

cards.name: CAW!+
cards.description:
Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies X+1 times. Apply X+1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Dark Pact
cards.description:
Gain 4 Plated Armor.
Shuffle a Regret into your draw pile.

cards.name: Dark Pact+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Plated Armor.
Shuffle a Regret into your draw pile.

cards.name: Dark Tribute
cards.description:
Heal ALL HP.
Gain !beaked:wI! Poison.
Wither -3.

cards.name: Dark Tribute+
cards.description:
Heal ALL HP.
Gain !beaked:wI! Poison.
Wither -2.

cards.name: Deep Focus
cards.description:
Ignore the next !beaked:wI! Wither effects this combat.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Deep Focus+
cards.description:
Ignore the next !beaked:wI! Wither effects this combat.
Wither 1.

cards.name: Fake Out
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

cards.name: Fake Out+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

cards.name: Full House
cards.description:
Draw !beaked:wI! cards.
Wither 3.

cards.name: Full House+
cards.description:
Draw !beaked:wI! cards.
Wither 2.

cards.name: Know Thy Foe
cards.description:
Add a random Elite card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Know Thy Foe+
cards.description:
Add a random Elite card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lift Off
cards.description: Take 50% less damage from attacks. If you are attacked 3 times in one turn, lose this power and skip your next turn.

cards.name: Lift Off+
cards.description: Take 50% less damage from attacks. If you are attacked 3 times in one turn, lose this power and skip your next turn.

cards.name: Machine Essence
cards.description: Whenever you receive healing, heal an additional 1 HP.

cards.name: Machine Essence+
cards.description: Whenever you receive healing, heal an additional 2 HP.

cards.name: Sacrifice
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Enemy heals for 18 HP.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 3 Max HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sacrifice+
cards.description:
Deal 27 damage.
Enemy heals for 27 HP.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 3 Max HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sacrificial Scars
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Gain 2 Max HP.
You cannot heal for 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sacrificial Scars+
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Gain 3 Max HP.
You cannot heal for 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Screeching Chant
cards.description:
Double your Ritual.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Screeching Chant+
cards.description:
Double your Ritual.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shadow Fade
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible for each 10 Strength you have.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Shadow Fade+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible for each 7 Strength you have.
Lose all Strength.

cards.name: Volatile Misfortune
cards.description: At the end of your turn, Retain all Unplayable cards. For each, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your Strength + 1.

cards.name: Volatile Misfortune+
cards.description: Innate. At the end of your turn, Retain all Unplayable cards. For each, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your Strength + 1.

cards.name: Wild Instinct
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If you have less than 50% HP when drawn, deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Wild Instinct+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If you have less than 50% HP when drawn, deal 25 damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Mending Plumage
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The Plumage merges with your feathers and makes you feel ...

relics.name: Throat Lozenge
relics.description: Ignore the first Wither effect each combat.

relics.name: Shiny Bauble
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 1 Ritual.

relics.name: Blessed Coat
relics.description: Replaces Mending Plumage. Upon playing a card, heal 1 HP. Every time you play 3 cards in a single turn, gain 1 Regen.

relics.name: Flawless Sticks
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Exhaust all Depleted cards.
relics.flavorText: A bundle of surprisingly beautiful sticks.

relics.name: Maw Fillet
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Shop spaces are replaced with Elite spaces.
relics.flavorText: The stench attracts the hungriest, repels the wealthiest.

relics.name: Sacred Deck
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose ANY card of any color to obtain.
relics.flavorText: Contains the deepest secrets of all who have entered the Spire.

relics.name: Sacred Necklace
relics.description:
Super-Rare!
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: A sparkling trinket from an exotic land...

relics.name: Sacrifice Doll
relics.description: On the first turn of each combat, play your entire hand on random targets at no cost.
relics.flavorText: This doll reminds you of a certain...robot. You feel as if it's always watching over you.

relics.name: Ritual Plumage
relics.description: If you end your turn without playing any cards, gain 2 Ritual. Only works once per combat.
relics.flavorText: The Strength of a Demon courses through you.

potions.name: Mending Brew
potions.description: Whenever you play a card, heal 1 HP.

keywords.name: Depleted
keywords.description: Unplayable unless the Wither effect is reversed.

keywords.name: Entangled
keywords.description: You cannot play Attack cards for one turn.

keywords.name: Inspiration
keywords.description: An unplayable status card. When drawn, it Exhausts and draws 2 more cards.

keywords.name: Psalm
keywords.description: A 0-cost attack card that deals 3 damage to ALL enemies and has Wither 2.

keywords.name: Regret
keywords.description: An unplayable curse card. While in your hand, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand at the end of the turn.

keywords.name: Respite
keywords.description: An unplayable status card. Heals 2 HP at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Ritual
keywords.description: Gain Strength at the beginning of your turn.

keywords.name: Stick
keywords.description: A 0-cost skill card that increases Stick Smack damage and returns a Stick Smack to your hand.

keywords.name: Wither
keywords.description: Permanently decrease this card's power by the wither amount. When it reaches 0, the card becomes Depleted. Can be replenished at Rest Sites.
